name: Public Panic
description: Your country is not prepared for the pandemic. The news of an unknown deadly virus being spread around the country has caused people to panic. People are asking the gvoernment to put a stop to the chaos.

choiceOne.description: Make public speechs and educate the public about the virus

log.content: The public calmed down after the government's education campaign, but many people has already potentially contacted the virus amid the chaos.

choiceTwo.description: Arrest people on the street and enforce curfew

log.content: People stopped panicking and started staying home after many has been arrested. Foreign governments condemn your country for your strict enforcement.

name: Karen's Outrage
description: A group of Karens are claiming that quarantine rules are an infringement to their rights, and they are taking it on the streets to protest against the government.

log.content: The Karens are satisfied and stopped protesting. Business owners are happy that the rules are less strict, but it comes with the risk of spreading the virus with more human contact.
The Karens are cleaned off the street, foreign governments are denouncing your action as oppression.

name: Cry For Help
description: A poor neighbouring country is asking for your assistance to help them combat the pandemic.

log.content: Your neighbouring country is very thankful of your help, your diplomatic relationship has improved significantly, with the cost being quite a bit of money and supply.
Your diplomatic relationship with your neighbouring country has worsen.

name: Misinformation
description: Conspiracy theorists are spreading misinformation on the internet, leading to many people refusing to wear masks and claim that 5G towers are the cause of the pandemic. If this isn't dealt with quickly, it could lead to serious consequences.

choiceOne.description: Arrest those who are spreading misinformation

log.content: Those who are spreading false information on the internet are arrested. Their supporters claim that them being arrested was a government cover up. Foreign enemies claim this is 'suppression of free speech'.
You spent quite a budget to run an anti-misinformation campaign to educate the public, it was successful for the most part, but you can't wake up someone who's pretending to sleep.

name: Toilet Paper Crisis
description: People are panick buying toilet paper for some reason. The toilet paper supply chain is getting overwhelmed and asking you for direction.

log.content: You released an order limiting the sales of toilet paper to a maximum of 1 roll per person per day.

choiceTwo.description: Mass produce low quality toilet paper

log.content: The increased supply of toilet paper still couldn't satisfy the overwhelming demand, many people rush to stores to hoard up toilet paper, without regard for the risk of contacting the virus.

name: Karen's Outrage II: Electric Boogaloo
description: Karens are throwing a tantrum because stores are denying them from entering without wearing a mask, claiming that it is an infringement of their rights.

choiceOne.description: Force the stores to let the Karens in

log.content: Stores are now forced to open their doors to people with no masks on.
New laws are released allowing store owners to refuse service to customers with no masks on. Karens are very upset and used this oppurtunity to bash your government with foreign media.

name: Game Over
description: Your country has collapsed because one of the statistic has fallen to 0. You were able to escape the group of rebels and rioters who attempted to murder you, but only to watch the country you once ruled fall into hands of revolutionists and foreign powers.

choiceOne.description: Give me another chance (this will start a new game for you)

log.content: Your rule ended here.

choiceTwo.description: I want to reminisce (you will remain here and can start new game later)

log.content: Your country has collapsed during the pandemic. You are now a refugee hiding from people who want you dead for your incompetent ruling.

name: Dying Business
description: Companies and corporations are complaining that their imported goods are stuck at the border because it has to go through virus test, and it's really hurting their business.

choiceOne.description: Compensate the companies for their goods

log.content: You compensated companies for the goods that are stuck in customs, it costed quite a bit of money, but it got the companies to shut up.

You ordered the customs and border control to go easy on the goods and let them through faster. Advisors warned about the possibility of the goods carrying the virus, but the monetary incentive was too high.

name: Stuck At Border
description: Some citizens who were travelling outside of the country are now stuck at the border and not allowed in. Medical professionals said it's only safe to let them into the country after 14 days of isolation.

choiceOne.description: Compensate those who are stuck at the border

log.content: You handed out monetary compensation for travellers who are stuck at the border, and arranged hotels for them to stay, now suddenly there's a lot more of them.

You forced the travellers to stay at the border for 14 days, most of them are understandable, but some started badmouthing your government with support of foreign countries, claiming that this is a violation of human right or something.

name: Overwhelmed Hospitals
description: With increasingly more people infected by the virus, the hospitals are running out of beds to treat patients.

log.content: After investing a large sum of money, temporary emergency hospitals are being built all around the country.

Museums which were already closed due to the pandemic are now being utilized to isolate patients. Although the equipments are not nearly as good as profesional hospitals, but it only costed a small amount of money in rent.

name: Karen's Outrage III: Revenge of the Karen
description: A group of Karens are holding anti-quarantine ralleys claiming that the virus is a government consipracy so they can install 5G towers, which will control people by communicating with microchips in future vaccines that are injected into their brain.

log.content: You joked about how these Karens aren't worth the price of a microchip. People embraced the memes and Karens are extremely embarassed.
People cheered as the Karens are arrested and fined, but foreign powers use this chance to attack your interantional reputation.

name: Boredom
description: People are very bored during quarantine.

log.content: People in your country now enjoys free anime streaming service, people are going out a lot less.
You sent seeds for everyone to learn how to garden at home, but it wasn't too effective. Turns out people are very lazy.
